decks.notes: The main idea of this deck is to utilize the Amulet of Vigor and various lands to cheat out Primeval Titan early in the game, allowing for explosive plays and ramping into powerful threats like Scapeshift or Urza's Saga. The deck focuses on assembling the right pieces to create a powerful synergy between lands and creatures, allowing for a quick and relentless combo finish. The inclusion of cards like Green Sun's Zenith and Lotus Field help to further enable the combo potential of the deck, creating a versatile and powerful strategy in the Modern format.

The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan with various disruptive creatures and spells, while also applying pressure with aggressive creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury. Elesh Norn, Mother of Machines can also act as a finisher to quickly close out the game. Teferi, Time Raveler helps to protect the key threats and disrupt the opponent's plays. The deck utilizes a combination of creature removal, counterspells, and card advantage to control the battlefield and secure a victory through a mix of tempo and aggression.

The main concept of this Boros Aggro deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells. The deck focuses on utilizing efficient creatures like Guide of Souls, Ragavan, and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury, along with burn spells like Galvanic Discharge and Thraben Charm to control the board and deal direct damage. Additionally, the deck includes support cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Goblin Bombardment to generate additional value and pressure. The mana base is optimized to ensure consistent access to both white and red mana sources.

The deck focuses on disrupting opponents' strategies through Counterspells and removal spells such as Fatal Push and Thoughtseize. It also includes a mix of creatures with disruptive abilities like Psychic Frog and Quantum Riddler for additional control. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student provides card advantage while Orcish Bowmasters offer a versatile option for dealing with creatures. The deck aims to control the board and limit the opponent's options until it can establish a strong advantage and close out the game with powerful threats like Kaito, Bane of Nightmares and Otawara, Soaring City.

The deck focuses on utilizing lands and ramp to quickly generate mana, allowing for powerful plays with Primeval Titan and Amulet of Vigor. By using cards like Scapeshift and green sun's zenith, the deck is able to search for key combo pieces and overwhelm opponents with multiple land drops and powerful threats. The deck aims to set up a strong board state quickly and efficiently, combining land synergies and powerful creature threats to create a winning strategy.

The deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with key creatures and then using instant reanimation spells to bring them back onto the battlefield for a powerful combo finish. It utilizes cards like Goryo's Vengeance and Solitude to cheat out big threats like Griselbrand and Atraxa, Grand Unifier. The deck seeks to disrupt opponents with cards like Thoughtseize and Prismatic Ending while also maintaining card advantage through Ephemerate and Faithful Mending. The strategy revolves around setting up explosive plays and overwhelming the opponent with fast, unexpected threats.

This deck focuses on using aggressive creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd to apply pressure on the opponent while disrupting their game plan with cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Prismatic Ending. The goal is to control the game through tempo plays and resource denial, utilizing unique cards like Quantum Riddler and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker to outmaneuver the opponent. The deck aims to establish a fast and efficient board presence while disrupting the opponent's strategy, ultimately leading to a quick victory.

The deck focuses on overwhelming the opponent with a fast-paced, aggressive strategy using cheap, efficient spells and creatures. By combining prowess abilities with pump spells and burn spells, the deck aims to quickly deal damage to the opponent and maintain pressure throughout the game. The card selection and filtering provided by cards like Expressive Iteration and Preordain help ensure efficient draws and consistent aggression. The key is to keep the opponent on the back foot by creating a strong board presence and maintaining a high rate of damage output.

This aggressive deck aims to disrupt the opponent's resources while applying pressure through efficient creatures and removal spells. By utilizing cards like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Teferi, Time Raveler, the deck can control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy. Consign to Memory and Prismatic Ending provide versatile removal options, while cards like Quantum Riddler and Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd offer additional threats and card advantage. The deck aims to assert dominance early in the game and maintain pressure throughout to secure a victory.

This deck aims to disrupt opponents' strategies while also applying pressure with aggressive creatures. By combining disruptive cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Consign to Memory with efficient creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd, the deck can control the game tempo and overwhelm opponents. Additionally, cards like Prismatic Ending and Quantum Riddler provide versatile removal options. The deck also features a versatile sideboard to adapt to different matchups and ensure a strong performance in different scenarios.

This deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures and disruptive spells to control the battlefield and disrupt the opponent's game plan. By efficiently deploying threats like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Phage, Titan of Fire's Fury, while also utilizing spells like Solitude and Prismatic Ending to remove key threats from the opponent's side, the deck aims to apply pressure and disrupt the opponent's strategy. The inclusion of cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Consign to Memory also provide additional disruption and control options, allowing the deck to outmaneuver and overwhelm opponents.

The key idea behind this deck is to use the interaction between creatures like Basking Broodscale, Blade of the Bloodchief, and Glaring Fleshraker to generate value and disrupt the opponent's game plan. By utilizing cards like Kozilek's Command and Malevolent Rumble, the deck aims to control the board while assembling the combo pieces needed to close out the game with cards like Emrakul, the Promised End. Cards like Urza's Saga and Eldrazi Temple provide additional mana acceleration to help achieve the combo win condition efficiently.

This deck focuses on aggressive gameplay by using low-cost creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Cori-Steel Cutter to deal quick damage to the opponent. It also utilizes spells like Lightning Bolt and Lava Dart for direct damage and removal. The deck includes cards like Expressive Iteration and Preordain for card selection and reach. With a combination of burn spells and efficient creatures, this deck aims to pressure the opponent early and maintain board presence to secure a fast victory.

The deck focuses on assembling the UrzaTron lands (Urza's Mine, Urza's Power Plant, Urza's Tower) to quickly generate a high amount of mana. It then uses this mana to cast powerful Eldrazi creatures and control spells, while also utilizing Karn, the Great Creator to shut down opponent's artifacts. The deck aims to control the board through mass removal spells like All Is Dust and targeted removal like Dismember, while disrupting the opponent's hand with Thought-Knot Seer. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats and resource denial.

The deck focuses on generating a large amount of red mana quickly through spells like Pyretic Ritual and Desperate Ritual in order to cast powerful combo spells like Grapeshot or Wish. It also utilizes card draw and filtering with Manamorphose and Ral, Monsoon Mage to dig for necessary pieces while maintaining consistent tempo. The inclusion of Past in Flames allows for recursion of key spells from the graveyard to ensure the combo can be executed successfully. Overall, the deck aims to quickly assemble its components and overwhelm the opponent with a devastating combo finish.

The main concept of this Aggro-Affinity deck is to quickly establish a strong board presence with cheap artifact creatures like Kappa Cannoneer and Memnite, while also utilizing cards like Mishra's Bauble and Urza's Saga to generate additional value. This deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a combination of aggressive creatures and efficient removal spells like Engineered Explosives and Metallic Rebuke. By leveraging artifacts and mana acceleration cards, this deck can quickly deploy threats and disrupt the opponent's game plan, ultimately leading to a swift victory.
